Class CompanyRepMenuView

Object
CompanyRepMenuView
public class CompanyRepMenuView extends Object
view class that provides console-based menu for company representatives allows managing internships and application decisions, performing CRUD actions, and updating visibility

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description

    shared scanner for console input

      Parameters:

      Returns:
